_header: Nevertheless I am sorry that Rygge
Subjects: letters; animals, domestic; Paston, John, II; Paston, John, III
_description: Expressions of regret regarding animal bites, written by John Paston II to John Paston III, 8 November 1472 — two couplets

BLAdd43491.Transcription:
Nuerthelesse I am sorye þat Ryggehathe bytyn hym soo by the
                    bygge& that lytell Qwayll pynchyd hys pendaunt so nyghe hys
                    tayle
BLAdd43491.Editions:
Davis,  Norman,
                        ed.  
             The Paston Letters and Papers of the Fifteenth Century.
         2 vols. Oxford: Clarendon, 1971, 1976: 452.
